description: Love potion gives a spooky twist to your Vodka Martini. Raspberry liqueur is to thank for the spooky red color. Add some dry ice to it, making it the&nbsp;perfect drink for the Halloween party.
name: Love Potion

recipeInstructions.name: Pour unsweetened cranberry juice, lemon juice, vodka, and Chambord into a cocktail shaker with 6 to 8 pieces of regular ice cubes. Shake until it becomes frosty cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour unsweetened cranberry juice, lemon juice, vodka, and Chambord into a cocktail shaker with 6 to 8 pieces of regular ice cubes. Shake until it becomes frosty cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture into a serving glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture into a serving glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Add a small dry ice cube (1/2 inch to 1 inch in size) to the glass to enjoy the smokey effect. You can use a tea ball strainer to encase the dry ice before submerging it into the drink.
recipeInstructions.text: Add a small dry ice cube (1/2 inch to 1 inch in size) to the glass to enjoy the smokey effect. You can use a tea ball strainer to encase the dry ice before submerging it into the drink.

recipeInstructions.name: Wait until the dry ice evaporates before drinking it.
